mapper.select: SELECT t.id, u.sid, u.email, t.title, t.type, t.opentype, t.money/${money_rate} as money_fmt, date_format( t.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS update_date_fmt, t.status, t.identificationnum, t.identificationimg, t.bankaccount, t.bankaddr, a.audit_desc, p.name as province_name, c.name as city_name, t.logistics_company, t.logistics_no, l.* FROM tb_srv_invoice t join tb_ucpaas_user u on t.sid = u.sid join tb_srv_invoice_addresslist l on t.postaddr = l.id left join tb_ucpaas_province p on p.id = l.province left join tb_ucpaas_city c on c.id = l.city LEFT JOIN tb_srv_audit a ON a.audited_id = t.id AND a.audit_type = 5 where t.id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_srv_invoice t SET t.status = 3,t.logistics_company = #{logistics_company}, t.logistics_no= #{logistics_no},t.update_date = now() WHERE t.id = #{id} and t.status = 2
mapper.select: select sid,username,email,mobile,realname as title,user_type as opentype from tb_ucpaas_user where sid = #{sid} LIMIT 1;

status=#{status},

money=#{money},

identificationnum=#{identificationnum},
identificationimg=#{identificationimg},

update_date=now()
where id=#{id} and sid=#{sid}
